meanings.definition: A secret plan by a group to do something unlawful or harmful.
meanings.sent1: The group's conspiracies were uncovered by the authorities.
meanings.sent2: There are many conspiracy theories about the moon landing.
meanings.sent3: The conspiracies of the cats to steal the treats were foiled by the vigilant dog.
meanings.sent4: The dark alley whispered with the conspiracies of shadows.
meanings.sent5: The teacher warned the students about the dangers of spreading false conspiracies.

meanings.definition: The action of plotting or conspiring.
meanings.sent1: The conspiracies of the villains were finally exposed in the movie.
meanings.sent2: The conspiracies of the spies were revealed during the investigation.
meanings.sent3: The conspiracies of the cookies to escape the jar amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The air was thick with the conspiracies of impending change.
meanings.sent5: The book delved into the dark world of political conspiracies.
